title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.18 - Switches and jumpers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.18 - Switches and jumpers

State Regulations
(a) All
hardware switches or jumpers contained in a gaming device shall be fully
documented for evaluation by an approved test laboratory. (b) All hardware switches and/or jumpers in a
gaming device that may alter configuration settings, pay tables, game
denomination or payout percentages shall meet the requirements of this Part and
shall be housed within a logic compartment of the gaming device. This includes
top award changes (including progressives), selectable settings or any other
option that would affect a payout percentage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5319.18

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
